what: PEcAn Package for Integration of the LINKAGES Model
title: PEcAn Package for Integration of the LINKAGES Model
text: Adding new model PEcAn easy steps: add modeltype BETY add model PFT BETY use modeltype implement 3 functions described execute pecan new model 3 functions need implemented, functions need MODEL replaced actual modeltype defined BETY database. write.config.MODEL.R write configuratin file well job launcher used PEcAn. example job execution script template folder. configuration file can also template found based revision number model. use computed results specified defaults trait.values write configuration file based PFT traits found. met2model.MODEL.R convert standard Met CF file model specific file format. allow PEcAn create metereological files specific site model. called meterological data found specific site model combination. model2netcdf.MODEL.R convert model specific output NACP Intercomparison format. function finished PEcAn use generated output use model specific outputs. outputs named YYYY.nc

title: Write LINKAGES met files — met2model.LINKAGES
text: Converts met CF file model specific met file. input files calld <.path>/<.prefix>.YYYY.cf

title: Write LINKAGES met files — met2model.LINKAGES
code: met2model.LINKAGES(   in.path,   in.prefix,   outfolder,   start_date,   end_date,   overwrite = FALSE,   verbose = FALSE,   ... )

title: Write LINKAGES met files — met2model.LINKAGES
text: .path path disk CF file lives .prefix prefix file outfolder location model specific output written start_date, end_date start end conversion. year portion used overwrite Force replacement existing output file? verbose ignored ... Additional arguments, currently ignored

title: Write LINKAGES met files — met2model.LINKAGES
text: OK everything succesful.

title: Write LINKAGES met files — met2model.LINKAGES
text: Ann Raiho, Betsy Cowdery

what: Convert LINKAGES's output into netCDF format — model2netcdf.LINKAGES
title: Convert LINKAGES's output into netCDF format — model2netcdf.LINKAGES
text: Convert MODEL output NACP Intercomparison format (ALMA using netCDF)

title: Convert LINKAGES's output into netCDF format — model2netcdf.LINKAGES
code: model2netcdf.LINKAGES(   outdir,   sitelat,   sitelon,   start_date = NULL,   end_date = NULL,   pft_names = NULL )

title: Convert LINKAGES's output into netCDF format — model2netcdf.LINKAGES
text: outdir Location model output sitelat Latitude site sitelon Longitude site start_date Start time simulation end_date End time simulation pft_names names PFTs use output labels

title: Convert LINKAGES's output into netCDF format — model2netcdf.LINKAGES

what: Writes a LINKAGES config file. — write.config.LINKAGES
title: Writes a LINKAGES config file. — write.config.LINKAGES
text: Requires pft xml object, list trait values single model run, name file create

title: Writes a LINKAGES config file. — write.config.LINKAGES
code: write.config.LINKAGES(   defaults = NULL,   trait.values,   settings,   run.id,   restart = NULL,   spinup = FALSE,   inputs = NULL,   IC = NULL )

title: Writes a LINKAGES config file. — write.config.LINKAGES
text: defaults list defaults process trait.values vector samples given trait settings list settings pecan settings file run.id id run restart logical: Write restart file? NULL (default), treated FALSE spinup logical: perform spinup using `spinup.LINKAGES()`? NULL (default), treated FALSE inputs inputs section PEcAn settings object. Currently used climate file (inputs$met$path), taken `settings$input$met$path` `inputs` NULL. IC TODO currently ignored

title: PEcAn.LINKAGES 1.7.5
text: model2netcdf.LINKAGES longer writes separate <year>.nc.var files every year output. Use PEcAn.utils::nc_write_varfiles() create needed.

title: PEcAn.LINKAGES 1.7.4
text: PEcAn.LINKAGES now distributed BSD three-clause license instead NCSA Open Source license.
